header.description: Should ideally be a patient access token but for now since only doctor flow is setup going with doctor access token

body.raw:
{
    "timestamp" : "2025-05-17T18:00:00",
    "query_summary" : "patient had fever, nausea and headache. They had it for 2 days and the headache increased progressively",
    "answer_summary" : "Doctor suggested Dengue as possible diagnosis and suggested tointake lot of water to keep hydrated.",
    "reference_files" : ["report.pdf"],
    "query_status" : "closed"
}

{
    "recordType" : "Report",
    "doctorId" : 6, // If the patient is not tagged to that doctor operation will fail
    "date" : "2025-06-17", // expectation of the date to be in this format
    "recordName" : "Follow-up report",
    "recordSource" : "record.pdf" // Needs to be the same S3 location that is currently used by onehat so it can be rendered in the application

}
